mapper.select: SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PASSWORD, MEM_NICKNM, MEM_STATE, LAST_LOGIN_DATE FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} AND MEM_STATE = 'ACTIVE'
